employment_agreement.name: Employment Agreement
employment_agreement.description: Standard employment contract for hiring employees
employment_agreement.content:
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT

This Employment Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of [DATE] between:

EMPLOYER: [COMPANY NAME], a company incorporated under the laws of India, having its registered office at [ADDRESS] ("Company")

and

EMPLOYEE: [EMPLOYEE NAME], residing at [ADDRESS] ("Employee")

1. POSITION AND DUTIES
The Employee is hired as [JOB TITLE] and shall perform duties as assigned by the Company.

2. TERM
This Agreement commences on [START DATE] and continues until terminated as per Section 8.

3. COMPENSATION
- Monthly Salary: Rs. [AMOUNT]
- Payment: By bank transfer on the last working day of each month
- Deductions: As per applicable tax laws

4. WORKING HOURS
Standard working hours: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday
Overtime as required with compensatory time off.

5. LEAVE ENTITLEMENT
- Casual Leave: 12 days per year
- Sick Leave: 12 days per year
- Earned Leave: 15 days per year

6. CONFIDENTIALITY
Employee shall maintain confidentiality of all proprietary information during and after employment.

7. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
All work product created during employment belongs to the Company.

8. TERMINATION
- Either party may terminate with [30] days written notice
- Company may terminate immediately for cause
- All company property must be returned upon termination

9. NON-COMPETE
Employee agrees not to join a competitor for [6] months post-termination within [CITY].

10. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
Disputes shall be resolved through arbitration in [CITY], India.

11. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement is governed by the laws of India.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement.

EMPLOYER: _______________     EMPLOYEE: _______________
Date: _______________         Date: _______________

vendor_agreement.name: Vendor/Supplier Agreement
vendor_agreement.description: Agreement for engaging vendors and suppliers
vendor_agreement.content:
VENDOR AGREEMENT

This Vendor Agreement ("Agreement") is made on [DATE] between:

BUYER: [COMPANY NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS] ("Company")

and

VENDOR: [VENDOR NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS] ("Vendor")

1. SCOPE OF SUPPLY
Vendor shall supply [GOODS/SERVICES DESCRIPTION] as per specifications in Schedule A.

2. TERM
This Agreement is effective from [START DATE] to [END DATE], renewable by mutual consent.

3. PRICING
- Price: As per Schedule B
- Taxes: [GST/All taxes] as applicable
- Price Revision: With 30 days written notice

4. DELIVERY
- Location: [DELIVERY ADDRESS]
- Schedule: As per purchase orders
- Delay Penalty: [X]% per week of delay, maximum [Y]%

5. PAYMENT TERMS
- Payment: Within [30] days of invoice
- Mode: Bank transfer/Cheque

6. QUALITY
- All goods must meet agreed specifications
- Inspection: Company may inspect before acceptance
- Defects: Vendor shall replace defective goods at no cost

7. WARRANTIES
Vendor warrants goods are free from defects for [12] months from delivery.

8. LIABILITY
- Each party's liability limited to [contract value/specific amount]
- Neither party liable for indirect or consequential damages

9. TERMINATION
- Either party: 30 days written notice
- Immediate termination for material breach

10. CONFIDENTIALITY
Both parties shall maintain confidentiality of business information.

11. GOVERNING LAW
Governed by laws of India. Disputes resolved in courts of [CITY].

SIGNED:

BUYER: _______________     VENDOR: _______________
Date: _______________      Date: _______________

service_agreement.name: Service Agreement
service_agreement.content:
SERVICE AGREEMENT

This Service Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into on [DATE] between:

CLIENT: [CLIENT NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS] ("Client")

and

SERVICE PROVIDER: [PROVIDER NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS] ("Provider")

1. SERVICES
Provider shall provide the following services:
[DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF SERVICES]

2. TERM
From [START DATE] to [END DATE], extendable by mutual agreement.

3. FEES AND PAYMENT
- Fee: Rs. [AMOUNT] [per month/per project/per hour]
- Invoice: [Monthly/On milestone completion]
- Payment: Within [30] days of invoice

4. DELIVERABLES
As specified in Schedule A, including:
- [DELIVERABLE 1]
- [DELIVERABLE 2]

5. ACCEPTANCE
- Client shall review deliverables within [10] business days
- Deemed accepted if no objection raised

6. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
- Pre-existing IP remains with respective owners
- Work product: [Assigned to Client / Licensed to Client]

7. CONFIDENTIALITY
- Valid for [2] years after Agreement termination
- Excludes publicly available information

8. WARRANTIES
Provider warrants services performed with reasonable skill and care.

9. LIABILITY
- Maximum liability: [Total fees paid under this Agreement]
- Excludes indirect damages

10. TERMINATION
- For convenience: [30] days notice
- For breach: [15] days to cure, then immediate

11. INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR
Provider is an independent contractor, not an employee.

12. GOVERNING LAW
Governed by laws of India. Arbitration in [CITY] for disputes.

AGREED:

CLIENT: _______________     PROVIDER: _______________
Date: _______________       Date: _______________

nda.name: Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
nda.description: Mutual confidentiality agreement for business discussions
nda.content:
NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT

This Non-Disclosure Agreement ("Agreement") is made on [DATE] between:

PARTY A: [NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS]

and

PARTY B: [NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS]

(collectively "Parties" and individually "Party")

1. PURPOSE
Parties wish to explore [BUSINESS PURPOSE] and may share confidential information.

2. CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION
Includes:
- Business plans, strategies, and financial data
- Technical information, designs, and specifications
- Customer and supplier information
- Any information marked as "Confidential"

Excludes:
- Publicly available information
- Information known before disclosure
- Information independently developed
- Information disclosed with written consent

3. OBLIGATIONS
Receiving Party shall:
- Use information only for the Purpose
- Protect with reasonable care (not less than own confidential information)
- Limit disclosure to employees with need-to-know
- Not copy without consent

4. TERM
This Agreement is effective for [2] years from the date hereof.
Confidentiality obligations survive for [3] years after termination.

5. RETURN OF INFORMATION
Upon request or termination, return or destroy all confidential information within [30] days.

6. NO LICENSE
No license or rights granted except to evaluate the Purpose.

7. NO OBLIGATION
This Agreement does not obligate Parties to enter into any transaction.

8. REMEDIES
Breach may cause irreparable harm. Injunctive relief may be sought without proving damages.

9. GOVERNING LAW
Governed by laws of India. Courts of [CITY] have jurisdiction.

SIGNED:

PARTY A: _______________     PARTY B: _______________
Date: _______________        Date: _______________

lease_agreement.name: Commercial Lease Agreement
lease_agreement.content:
COMMERCIAL LEASE AGREEMENT

This Lease Agreement ("Agreement") is made on [DATE] between:

LANDLORD: [NAME], residing at [ADDRESS] ("Lessor")

and

TENANT: [COMPANY NAME], having its office at [ADDRESS] ("Lessee")

1. PREMISES
Property at: [FULL ADDRESS]
Area: [X] sq. ft.
Purpose: [Commercial office/Shop/Warehouse]

2. TERM
- Lease Period: [X] years from [START DATE] to [END DATE]
- Lock-in Period: [X] months (neither party can terminate)

3. RENT
- Monthly Rent: Rs. [AMOUNT]
- Due Date: [1st] of each month
- Escalation: [X]% per year
- Late Fee: [X]% per month of delay

4. SECURITY DEPOSIT
- Amount: Rs. [AMOUNT] (X months rent)
- Refundable within [30] days of vacancy, after deducting dues

5. MAINTENANCE
- Lessee: Interior maintenance, minor repairs
- Lessor: Structural repairs, major maintenance
- Common Area: Shared as per [agreement]

6. UTILITIES
Electricity, water, internet: Lessee's responsibility as per meter/bill.

7. MODIFICATIONS
No structural changes without Lessor's written consent.

8. TERMINATION
- After lock-in: [3] months written notice
- Immediate: For material breach

9. RENEWAL
Lessee has first right to renew at mutually agreed terms, with [60] days advance notice.

10. INDEMNITY
Lessee indemnifies Lessor for damages arising from Lessee's use of premises.

11. GOVERNING LAW
Governed by laws of India and [STATE] Rent Control Act. Courts of [CITY] have jurisdiction.

WITNESSES:
1. _______________
2. _______________

LESSOR: _______________     LESSEE: _______________
Date: _______________       Date: _______________

partnership_deed.name: Partnership Deed
partnership_deed.description: Agreement between partners for a partnership firm
partnership_deed.content:
PARTNERSHIP DEED

This Partnership Deed ("Deed") is made on [DATE] between:

1. [PARTNER 1 NAME], residing at [ADDRESS] ("First Partner")
2. [PARTNER 2 NAME], residing at [ADDRESS] ("Second Partner")
[Additional partners as needed]

(collectively "Partners")

1. FIRM NAME AND BUSINESS
- Name: [FIRM NAME]
- Business: [NATURE OF BUSINESS]
- Principal Place: [ADDRESS]

2. COMMENCEMENT AND DURATION
- Commencement: [DATE]
- Duration: [At Will / Fixed term of X years]

3. CAPITAL CONTRIBUTION
- First Partner: Rs. [AMOUNT] ([X]%)
- Second Partner: Rs. [AMOUNT] ([X]%)
Additional capital as mutually agreed.

4. PROFIT AND LOSS SHARING
- First Partner: [X]%
- Second Partner: [X]%
Losses shared in same ratio unless otherwise agreed.

5. DRAWINGS
Partners may draw up to Rs. [AMOUNT] per month against profits.

6. INTEREST ON CAPITAL
[X]% per annum on capital contributions.

7. MANAGEMENT
- All partners have equal right to participate
- Major decisions require unanimous consent
- Day-to-day operations: [Managing Partner / All partners]

8. BANKING
Bank Account: [BANK NAME]
Operation: [Any one / Any two partners jointly]

9. ACCOUNTS AND AUDIT
- Financial year: April to March
- Books maintained at principal place
- Annual audit by [Internal / Chartered Accountant]

10. ADMISSION OF NEW PARTNERS
Requires unanimous consent of existing partners.

11. RETIREMENT
- [X] months written notice required
- Settlement within [X] months of retirement

12. DEATH OF PARTNER
Firm continues with remaining partners. Deceased partner's share paid to legal heirs.

13. DISSOLUTION
By unanimous consent or as per Indian Partnership Act, 1932.

14. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
Arbitration in [CITY] as per Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996.

15. GOVERNING LAW
Governed by Indian Partnership Act, 1932 and laws of India.

IN WITNESS WHEREOF:

First Partner: _______________
Second Partner: _______________
[Additional signatures]

Witnesses:
1. _______________
2. _______________

Date: _______________
